issue.description: Should the select be extended by Identification_assignment here or should this be in ap239_management_resource_information?
Have added Organization, Security_classification, Approval_status. These should perhaps be in
Approval_status should be added in
Alias_identification should be added to:
There should a subtype constraint against product, restricting the the subtype to be a one of Document, Part, Requirement

comment.description: The sub type constraint is applied in Ap239_product_definition_information

issue.description: Add document and document version.

comment.description: Corrected subsequent to release to convener.

issue.description: Add requirement, requirement_version, document, document_version, document_definition

comment.description: Corrected subsequent to release to convener.

issue.description: Remove bibitem.inc ref="ISO10303-1123" as 1123 is already referenced in the normative references

description.p: Need to include effectivity module and extend select effectivity_item to enable application of dated effectivity to:

Address_assignment Applied_information_usage_right Approval_assignment Assigned_property, Certification_assignment Contract_assignment Document_assignment, Document_definition, Document_definition_relationship, Document_location_identification, File, File_relationship, Identification_assignment, Interface_connection, Interface_connector_design_to_planned, Interface_connector_design_to_realized, Interface_connector_planned_to_realized, Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment Organization_relationship Product, Product_as_individual, Product_design_to_individual, Product_planned_to_realized, Product_view_definition, Product_version, Product_version_relationship, Project_assignment,
Requirement_assignment, Requirement_collection_relationship, Requirement_source, Requirement_version_relationship, Security_classification_assignment

Note - the following sub types of Product, Product_version and Product_view_definition are included by inheritance: Document, Document_version, Part, Part_version, Part_view_definition, Requirement, Requirement_version, Requirement_view_definition,

comment.description: Person_or_organization_or_person_in_organization_in_position_relationship should be added in a higher level module.

issue.description: Product_as_realized and Product_as_planned should be added to the select items for Effectivity_assignment.items

External_class needs to be a valid select item for Contract_assignment.items. How otherwise is it possible to make an External_class a subject of a contract? The same restriction seems to concern documents.

comment.description: Would it not be better to include External_class_library as a contractable item? That way you can say that thi reference library is part of the contract. Or are you saying that we should explicitly list all the classes that are in the contract?

External_class_library is also required as contractable item. There is also the need to provide more detail in a contract, that is, to say which classes of a reference data library are included in the contract.

issue.description: Changed "for example" to an example
Changed PADI to padi as the abbreviations is only used in the type definition.
This should import from condition_characterized and condition_evaluation_characterized

It should be possible to have a representation as a parameter to a condition. Extend the select ap239_padi_condition_evaluation_parameter_item and ap239_padi_condition_parameter_item with representation.

comment.description: The following have also been added to allow properties as well as the representation to be parameters to condition. Assigned_property Property_representation Note that Activity_property Activity_property_representation should be added in a higher level module.

issue.description: It is not possible to define any meta-data that goes with a View_definition_context. Examples are who defined it, when defined and associated documents. This would require extending the relevant selects. This requirement arose when considering that use of PLCS may require a greater number of specific concepts than has been the case with AP203, etc.

The module uses from condition, however, the condition is not applied to anything, i.e. the condition_item select is not extended. The use of condition should be delayed to ap239_product_definition_information.

comment.description: The select condition_item needs to contain: Approval, Approval_assignment This is needed to represent a concession. This was raised as issue: RBN-12-RNTRILS in Ap239_product_definition_information In addition document_assignment is added.

issue.description: The select state_of_item has been removed from the IR state_observed_schema, renamed to state_observed_of_item and added to State_observed_mim. This requires a change to the MIM and the mapping of this module.
It seems not possible to assign properties to conditions. Also, it is desirable to assign conditions to properties (a property which only is valid if a motor goes with 100 rpm).

comment.description: The assignment of properties to conditions is done as condition_parameters. Conditions can now be assigned to Assigned_property.

issue.description: Condition_parameter condition_parameter_item should be extended to include amongst other things; Product_concept, State_definition, State_observed

The module should use from justification. The select justification_item should contain: Approval, Approval_assignment, Document_assignment Product, Product_version, Product_definition, Document_definition Observation, Effectivity, Message The select justification_support_item should contain Observation

comment.description: Extending the selects with Observation should be done in Ap239_activity_recording

issue.description: The module should use from justification and characterize justification. I.e. enable person,organization, date, approval, identification to be applied. The select classification_item should contain: Justification_assignment Justification_support_assignment Justification Justification_relationship

Add Condition Condition_evaluation Effectivity_assignment Interface_specification Requirement_assignment Requirement_source State State_assertion State_assessment State_definition to documented_element_select
Add Effectivity Effectivity_assignment to classification_item

description.p: Add Product Product_view_definition Effectivity Effectivity_assignment to classified_attribute_select.

issue.description: Add to effectivity_item Effectivity_assignment

description.p: There is a requirement to assign properties to the assignment of a person or organization to product data. That is, Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment needs to be a valid select item for Assigned_property.described_element.

Example: A workshop is certified to perform maintenance work of a certain level in the context of one product. The property "capable of maintenance level" should be assigned to the relationship between the organization and the maintenance task, not to the organization. For another product or task the shop may be good for another level.
Add Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment to Property_assignment_select.

comment.description: The example is better implemented by using classification of Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment. However, the requirement is accepted and have added Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment to Property_assignment_select.

description.p: Attribute_classification and Classification_assignment can currently not be used for Effectivity_assignment.
Add Effectivity_assignment to Classification_item and to Classified_attribute_select.

comment.description: Added Effectivity_assignment and Effectivity to ap239_padi_classification_item and to ap239_padi_classified_attribute_select.

description.p: There is a need to assign a Dated_effectivity to the Effectivity_assignment of a Serial_effectivity to give a period of validity to the serial effectivity assignment. Currently the items select-type does not include Effectivity_assignment, but it should.
Add Effectivity_assignment to Effectivity_item.

issue.description: Need to assign a project to an independent property to provide a context for an independent property.

description.p: It should be possible to assign not only a start_id string to an effectivity, but also the instance directly. Start_id should be a select type.

Change Serial_effectivity.start_id and Serial_effectivity.end_id to select types that allow instances to be pointed at directly, not via comparing the strings of two identifiers - not knowing which identifier of the serialized item to choose.

comment.description: The resolution is to create a sub type of effectivity "Product_as_individual_effectivity" which has an attribute listing the set of Product_as_individuals for which the effectivity applies.

issue.description: Add product_version and product_view_definition to ap239_padi_organization_or_person_in_organization ap239_padi_date_and_time_item ap239_padi_documented_element_select
Add security_classification, security_classification_assignment ap239_padi_documented_element_select
organization_or_person_in_organization_item does not include product_category or product_category_assignment.
Add classification_assignment to justification_item
You need to be able to assign an identifier to a Product_concept.

comment.description: Can now assign an identifier to a Product_concept.

issue.description: Need to be able to assign a project to a part and product_as_realized.

comment.description: Can now assign a project to a product and product_version

issue.description: The project entity has a dates as attributes. However, this does not allow any history of dates. For example, the project is delayed, so it gets a new start date. So enable date-assignment to project.
you need dated_effectivity on the date-assignment to represent a series of start dates of a project for example.

The following characterizations are required:
Extend approval_item to include: Product_category_assignment Applied_state_assignment Applied_state_definition_assignment Effectivity_assignment
Extend date_or_date_time_item to include: Effectivity_assignment Product_category_assignment
Extend organization_or_person_in_organization_item to include: Effectivity_assignment
Need to be able to assign requirements to product_view_definitions
Need to be able to assign source of requirements to product_view_definitions

description.p: (2) Clause: Express Independent_property
One of the contexts for Independent_property is a project.
Extend the select project_item to include Independent_property.

comment.description: The select ap239_padi_project_item already contains Independent_property.

description.p: (2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Serial_effectivity

It should be possible to assign not only a string as a start_id to an effectivity, but also the instance directly. The same id-string may be used in different context so that the instance may not be identified unambiguously.
A solution similar to the Product_as_individual_effectivity is required. start_id and end_id both need to refer to the instance itself, not to an id.

comment.description: Requested facility is already available through the use of Product_as_individual_effectivity

description.p: (2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Attribute_classification.classified_entity, classification_item
It is currently not possible to classify attributes of entity Physical_element and similar, but there may be requirements to classify the names of such.
Add Physical_element to classification_item.

comment.description: Discussed in ISO mtg session. Long term principle - extend attribute classification to all entities that can be classified. Therefore do nothing now. (accepted by commenter) Add commentary to Annex H.

description.p: (2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Alias_identification

There is a requirement to specify which type of identification another identification system provides an alias for. Currently Alias_identification only points at the thing that is given an alias id, but does not relate to the other ids.
Either Alias_identification should get an optional link to an Identification_assignment, or Alias_identification.items can be assigned directly to an Identification_assignment.
Agreed actions with commenter:
1. Add Identification_assignment to alias_identification_item select type.
2. Describe use of Alias-assignment in annex H.
Text added to annex H.
(2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Assigned_property.described_element, Property_assignment_select

According to the current model, Assigned_property can not be assigned to Product_version_relationship. Instead a View_definition_relationship shall be created and the Assigned_property assigned to it.
Update the documentation of the model accordingly, that is, specifically for Product_version_relationship.
Add Product_version_relationship to property_assignment_select. Suggest this is done in Ap239_part_defintion_information in ap239_padi_property_assignment_select.

comment.description: What is the business requirement for assigning a property to a Product_version_relationship? Product_version_relationship is used to represent the sequence of versions - why do you need properties for this?
The comment has been withdrawn following discussion with the commenter.

description.p: (2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Approval_item

It should be possible to assign approvals to relationships like Product_version_relationship and View_definition_relationship. It seems not sufficient to approve only the related or relating. Several relationship instances may involve the same related or relating. Also Product_view_definition should be subject to approval.
Include Product_version_relationship, View_definition_relationship, and Product_view_definition in Approval_item.
Extend approval_item to include selects as proposed.

comment.description: Extended select in ARM with Product_version_relationship, View_definition_relationship. Product_view_definition:

description.p: (2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Date_or_date_time_assignment, Date_or_date_time_item
It should be possible to assign dates to Product_version_relationship, as it currently is to assign to Product_version.
Include Product_version_relationship in Date_or_date_time_item.

comment.description: What purpose will it serve to assign a date to the relationship? When you create a version it will get a date. If you relate the version to its previous version - what will a date assigned to the relationship say? The date when the relationship was created in the database?

We cannot assume that all relationships come into existence when the version is created. Therefore, after discussion at the BCR session in Seattle, resolution changed to accept. Follow proposal given.

description.p: (3) Paragraph: 5.1.23

The mapping is incomplete: applied_effectivity_context_assignment applied_effectivity_context_assignment <- effectivity_context_role effectivity_context_role.name = 'product as individual effectivity'

applied_effectivity_context_assignment => effectivity_context_assignment effectivity_context_assignment.role -> effectivity_context_role effectivity_context_role.name = 'product as individual effectivity'

issue.description: Effectivity_relationship should be added to the ap239_padi_classification_item
Add Product_as_individual Product_design_version_to_individual to the select ap239_padi_approval_item
Add Product_design_version_to_individual to the select ap239_padi_classification_item
Add Product_design_version_to_individual Product_as_individual to the select ap239_padi_date_or_date_time_item

Add Product_design_version_to_individual to the select ap239_padi_effectivity_item

Add Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_view to select ap239_padi_identification_item
Add Product_as_individual to select ap239_certification_item
Add Product_as_individual to select ap239_padi_contract_item
Add Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_view to select ap239_padi_information_usage_right_item
Add Product_as_individual_version Part_version to select ap239_padi_project_item

comment.description: Already has Product_version which the supertype.

issue.description: Add Product_as_individual_version to select ap239_padi_requirement_assignment_item
Add Product_as_individual_version Remove Product_as_individual to select ap239_padi_requirement_source_item

Add Part Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_version Product_as_individual_view Product_design_version_to_individual Product_design_to_individual to select ap239_padi_security_classification_item
Add Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_view to select ap239_padi_state_definition_of_item
Add Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_view to select ap239_padi_state_of_item
Add Product_as_individual Product_as_individual_version Product_as_individual_view to select ap239_padi_string_select

Extend the select justification_support_item with:
Descriptive_document_property Independent_property Independent_property_relationship Numerical_document_property

Extend the select justification_item with:
Descriptive_document_property Independent_property Independent_property_relationship Numerical_document_property

Add a subtype constraint extending the one-of of effectivity to include Product_as_individual_effectivity SUPERTYPE OF (ONEOF (Serial_effectivity, Dated_effectivity, Lot_effectivity, Time_interval_effectivity));
Extend the select property_assignment_select with: Project
Remove the entity Connector_on from ap239_padi_state_definition_of_item Add the entity Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection
Remove the entity Connector_on from ap239_padi_state_of_item Add the entity Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection

Remove the entity Connector_on from ap239_padi_string_select Extend the select sap239_padi_string_select with: Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for

Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for

Extend the select certification_item with: Interface_definition_connection

Extend the select classified_attribute_select with: Interface_definition_connection
Extend the select condition_evaluation_item with: Hierarchical_interface_connection Interface_connection Interface_definition_connection

Extend the select condition_evaluation_parameter_item with: Hierarchical_interface_connection Independent_property_representation Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection
Extend the select condition_item with: Hierarchical_interface_connection Interface_connection Interface_definition_connection

Extend the select condition_parameter_item with: Hierarchical_interface_connection Independent_property_representation Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection

Extend the select date_or_date_time_item with: Effectivity Hierarchical_interface_connection Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for
Extend the select documented_element_select with: Effectivity Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Market
Extend the select effectivity_item with: Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for
Extend the select identification_item with: Effectivity Information_right Information_usage_right Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Market
Extend the select information_usage_right_item with: Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for
Extend the select justification_item with: Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection

Extend the select justification_support_item with:
Effectivity Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection
Extend the select organization_or_person_in_organization_item with: Effectivity Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for

Extend the select property_assignment_select with: Hierarchical_interface_connection Interface_connection Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Address Person Person_in_organization

Extend the select requirement_assignment_item with:
Interface_connector_occurrence

Extend the select requirement_source_item with:
Interface_connector_occurrence

Extend the select security_classification_item with:
Hierarchical_interface_connection Interface_connection Interface_connector Interface_connector_occurrence Interface_definition_connection Interface_definition_for
Extend the select documented_element_select with: Person_in_organization
there does not seem to be a mapping for the subtype constraint restrict_effectivity_subtypes.

comment.description:
You are right, but I do not see what sort of rule should be written. The entities serial_numbered_effectivity, dated_effectivity, lot_effectivity, time_interval_based_effectivity are all sub types of effectivity and map accordingly. Product_as_individual_effectivity maps to applied_effectivity_context_assignment.
So, unlike the ARM, the effectivity entities do not have a common super type in the MIM. Hence it is not clear at all what rule, if any should be written.
In order to ensure interoperability, I have renamed restrict_effectivity_subtypes restrictap239_padi__effectivity_subtypes

concerning 1293 and the ARM subtype constraint restrict_effectivity_subtypes: this is a case that the mapping guidelines do not cover well, I think. I suggest that you include a clause in the mapping specifcation according to 5.3 in QCN241, the final case there: "When an ARM SUBTYPE_CONSTRAINT is mapped onto the constraint of a SUPERTYPE statement, ...".
In addition, I would list the AIM entity applied_effectivity_context_assignment with text like: "The structure of the AIM implicitly supports this explicit constraint of the ARM." I am happy to receive better proposals to include them in the update of the mapping guidelines :-)
